snippet.title: Kabul Spy walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Sirius)
snippet.description:
Kabul Spy was a graphics adventure game published by Sirius in 1982 for the Apple ][. My favorite part of the game is using "ERASE BRIDGE" to get rid of an impassable bridge.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is mostly done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.virtualapple.org
Walkthrough - www.textfiles.com
